original_text: the killer shall be sent for by the town elders, be brought back from the city, and be handed over to the avenger of blood to die.
korean_text: 그 본 성읍 장로들이 사람을 보내어 그를 거기서 잡아다가 보복자의 손에 넘겨 죽이게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: the killer shall be sent for by the town elders
be brought back from the city
and be handed over to the avenger of blood
